name: Ogre Zombie
description: The Ogre Zombie is a reanimated corpse of an ogre, with decaying flesh and a massive, bulky frame. It is mindless and attacks with brute force using a Greatclub.
memorable: Its ability to remain standing after fatal damage creates a daunting challenge for adventurers.
goals: Typically used as shock troops by necromancers, charging into battle fearlessly.
relations: Often encountered alongside other undead creatures or serving dark wizards.
environment: Commonly found in regions associated with necromancy or among undead hordes.
strengths: High strength and durability with immunity to poison and exhausting conditions.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and poor Intelligence, making it vulnerable to finesse attacks.
attacks: Employs powerful melee strikes with a Greatclub, and can inflict damage with additional attacks like Bite or grab foes.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to potentially drop to 1 hit point instead of 0 when reduced.
senses: It can see in dim light through darkvision up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Immune to conditions affecting living beings such as fatigue and poison.
Lumbering Charge ability to push through enemies while damaging them.
Can heal itself from bites inflicted on grappling targets.
Limited interaction; understands some languages but cannot speak.
test_queries: large undead creature with great strength
mindless zombie that uses a club
brute undead monster that charges into battle
relentless ogre zombie with high durability
massive creature immune to poison effects
